title: veigar
body:
maybe its the time do to something about that cancerous passive no ? you know the kind that even if he get no kill after 2 3 item he got more than 500 600 ap for free and leave you no chance to do anything because he took void staff in the first 3 item ( and maybe tone down a little his ult that points and click and poof you're dead 
for nasus ok he need to reach you and you can kite him  but veigar its all his skill that become broken for free he just have to farm with his q and the passive stack like hell.... end game you litteraly get one shot even if you have mr because he usually get more than 1000ap after 30 40min

replies.body: That AP isn't free. He has to either CS with Q or hit champs with spells. Dodge his spells and don't let him free farm.

Lmao all infinite scaling champs give you the same kind of timer except maybe thresh. If you can’t end before like 45 minutes then yea you’re kinda screwed, but veigar and these other champs are total liabilities early. Veigar is so easy to bully for most mids. Conditional and delayed cc on one long cd ability, no mobility, no safety, and low range. You basically have to let veigar land his cage for him to do anything. He’s a pretty fair design. His scalings  also ain’t that hot due to his passive.

Just had a game as Ryze vs Veigar where I built Mercury Treads, Abyssal mask and had seraphs and Rylais. I absolutely destroyed him in lane but come 30 minutes (which is way too early for Veigar to be that strong) he was able to one shot everyone on my team including me with just 2 his q ult. I think his ult, for the power it gains needs to be a skill shot and they need to remove or re-work his passive.
